item.title: Cluster Analysis for Portfolio Selection
item.description: We implement a hierarchical risk parity portfolio (LdP2016) for assets to explore the use of cluster analysis for portfolio constructive and compare this with standard mean-variance methods. The data will be sourced from Bloomberg. We will attempt to combine the HRP portfolio with the mean-variance portfolio using the Historical Simulation with Flexible Probabilities (HS-FP) framework developed by Meucci(M2010). Theoretical Proficiencies: Stochastic processes, optimization theory, portfolio theory
